actionTemplate.title: Big-Hook Eyeshadow
steps: Draw a larger hook covering the outer crease area with a deep shade
Deepen inside the hook and lift the outer edge upward
Blend a transition shade through the crease for a wide gradient
Reinforce the lash line and outer corner for structure

rationaleTemplate: Camera-friendly: extension and lift in one shape.
Needs careful blending to stay clean and intentional.
